title: Luxury Living in Mid-rise, 1B1Ba Unit Available Now.
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Acappella!', 'Acappella Apartments at The Crossing Introduces Contemporary Luxury Living in the Heart of the San Francisco Peninsula.', "Positioned within San Bruno's The Crossing, Acappella boasts an ideal location with a variety of nearby shopping, dining, entertainment options, walking distance to 2 parks, and easy access to public transportation and major freeways.", 'The luxury apartments are masterfully crafted to create a quality living environment through a unique blend of timeless luxury design.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 80', 'OR Text', '80', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 836 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- GE Washer/Provided', '- Telecommunications System', '- Heating & Air Conditioning in Every Home', "- 9' High Ceiling", '- GE Stainless Appliances', '- Individual Patios and Balconies', '- USB Ports', '- Extra-large Windows', '- Newly Upgraded Sound-tec Floating Floor Flooring', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- Spa Inspired Shower Heads', '- Hello Alfred!', 'The Properties Home Assistant', 'Community Amenities', '- Underground Parking', '- Smoke-Free lifestyle in our community', '- BBQ grills', '- (BART, CalTrain)', '- Outdoor Pool and Spa', '- Walking Distance to Shops', '- Public Park', '- Public Dog Park', '- Lavish Interior Courtyard', '- Close to Public Transportation', '- Fully Equipped 24/7 Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Driving Directions', "Once you turn onto National Ave you'll see 4 similar looking buildings, Acappella is the red building and you're able to drive underneath our waterfall to get to our visitor's parking.", "Take the elevator up just past our mailbox area to 1 and it'll bring you right in front of our office.", 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Acappella', '1001 National Ave, San Bruno, CA, 94066', 'rsYwvs8hf3Wc']
